meanings.definition: The physical characteristics of a mesomorph.
meanings.sent1: His mesomorphies included strong muscles and a broad chest.
meanings.sent2: She admired the mesomorphies of the bodybuilder at the gym.
meanings.sent3: The costume party had everyone showing off their mesomorphies in superhero outfits.
meanings.sent4: In the world of giants, his mesomorphies made him stand out like a mountain among hills.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the mesomorphies of the athlete in stunning detail.

meanings.definition: The act of exhibiting mesomorphic traits.
meanings.sent1: Her mesomorphies on the field impressed the coach.
meanings.sent2: The competition focused on the mesomorphies of strength and agility.
meanings.sent3: The dance performance showcased the mesomorphies of grace and power.
meanings.sent4: His speech had the mesomorphies of confidence and charisma.
meanings.sent5: The painting beautifully depicted the mesomorphies of speed and endurance.

meanings.sent1: The gym was filled with the mesomorphies of dedicated athletes.
meanings.sent2: The magazine cover highlighted the mesomorphies of fitness and health.
meanings.sent3: At the party, the guests marveled at the mesomorphies of the bodybuilder.
meanings.sent4: The movie star's presence exuded the mesomorphies of glamour and strength.
meanings.sent5: The fashion show celebrated the mesomorphies of style and confidence.
